description: This modulet is part of the Roots & Wings 2.0 programme. This modulet focuses on helping students recognize potential self-defeating beliefs and biases, and to overcome those beliefs. Students will engage in experiential activities that foster positive emotions, engagement with the work they do and the people they interact with, and a positive narrative of their lives. The general aim of this modulet is to increase studentsâ€™ awareness of self-limiting beliefs and to equip them with mindsets/behaviors that build psychological resilience.
title: Cultivating Resilience
